feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added support for Node 22 - Daniel Lockyer
  • 🐛 Fixed missing attribution in new member and new subscription staff emails (#22252) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed subscription attribution sometimes missing from SubscriptionCreatedEvent (#22219) - Steve Larson
  • 🌐 Updated Slovak translations (#21800) - Techkrypt-xyz
  • 🌐 Added missing Russian translations (#22186) - Paul

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.6...v5.110.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.1
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.110.0...v5.110.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.2
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed comment reference snippet overflowing (#22275) - Sanne de Vries
  • 🌐 Added translation logic for "Add a personal note" in Tips & Donations - Cathy Sarisky

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.110.1...v5.110.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.3
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed email domain blocklist not being checked when a member updates their email address (#22320) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.110.2...v5.110.3

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.4
entry.content:
